column3: Replaces with ੲੈ instead of ਐ , replaces with ਅੋ instead of ਓ
This is more in line with what it is supposed to be in comparison to Devanagari.
Automatically fixes some typing mistakes related to vowel maatras.
Intended to be used alongside this keyboard layout program:
Uses U+0A72 + U+0A48 instead of U+0A0F
Uses U+0A05 + U+0A4B instead of U+0A13
